title: Define Project Scope and Requirements (Revised)
description: Create a comprehensive technical document detailing the project's requirements for the neural interface-based assistant. This includes specifying its intended functionality, target user profiles, integration with existing systems, performance requirements (response time, memory usage), security considerations (authentication, authorization, encryption), accessibility requirements, any other relevant constraints or assumptions, potential future expansion plans, and guidelines for collaboration with the development team to ensure alignment with project goals and overall architecture. The document should be detailed enough to enable the Project Manager to create user stories and facilitate the creation of task breakdowns. Include clear milestones, timelines, and deliverables within the document, along with specific metrics for each requirement where appropriate. Consider potential scalability issues, error handling, and edge cases. Upon completion, reviewers should be able to use this document as a blueprint for the development process. If necessary, break down the requirements into smaller, manageable tasks. Once complete, update the 'rfc_state' field to 'REVIEWED'. Also, suggest potential improvements such as incorporating agile methodologies and adding a section for non-functional requirements like usability, scalability, and reliability. To ensure clarity, provide examples where appropriate. If any task dependencies are identified, update the 'dependencies' field accordingly.

title: Design System Architecture
description: Develop the overall architecture and design of the system, including the neural interface, task coordination engine, and integration with other components.

title: Implement Neural Interface
description: Develop the neural interface component responsible for interpreting brain signals and translating them into commands or actions.

title: Develop Task Coordination Engine
description: Implement the task coordination engine that orchestrates and manages tasks based on the input from the neural interface and other sources.

title: Build User Interface
description: Design and develop the user interface for the assistant, allowing users to interact with the system and monitor task progress.

title: Integrate with Existing Systems
description: Develop interfaces and adapters to integrate the assistant with existing workplace systems, such as project management tools, communication platforms, and data sources.

title: Implement Security Measures
description: Ensure the security of the system by implementing appropriate measures, such as authentication, authorization, data encryption, and secure communication protocols.

title: Set up Development Environment
description: Configure the development environment, including version control, continuous integration, and deployment pipelines.

title: Develop Test Suite
description: Create a comprehensive test suite to ensure the quality and reliability of the system, including unit tests, integration tests, and end-to-end tests.

title: Write Documentation
description: Prepare documentation for the system, including user guides, developer documentation, and maintenance manuals.
